lines.text: Okay, that was... definitely something. Moving on.
lines.voiceText: Okay, that was... definitely something. Moving on.

lines.text: I don't know what that was, but let's pretend it didn't happen.
lines.voiceText: I don't know what that was, but let's pretend it didn't happen.

lines.text: Folks, I apologize for that detour. Some people just like to hear their own voice.
lines.voiceText: Folks, I apologize for that detour. Some people just like to hear their own voice.

lines.text: And THAT is why we have a screening process. Anyway...
lines.voiceText: And THAT is why we have a screening process. Anyway...

lines.text: Okay then. Well. That didn't go where I expected. Who's next?
lines.voiceText: Okay then. Well. That didn't go where I expected. Who's next?

lines.text: *yawn* You know, I've been thinking... about sleep.
lines.voiceText: *yawn* You know, I've been thinking... about sleep.

lines.text: Something's been bothering me... tiredness, I guess.
lines.voiceText: Something's been bothering me... tiredness, I guess.

lines.text: *grunt* I've been pondering... exhaustion.
lines.voiceText: *grunt* I've been pondering... exhaustion.

lines.text: You know what keeps me up? Everything.
lines.voiceText: You know what keeps me up? Everything.

lines.text: You know, I've been thinking... about how bleak it all is.
lines.voiceText: You know, I've been thinking... about how bleak it all is.

lines.text: Something's been bothering me... the futility of it all.
lines.voiceText: Something's been bothering me... the futility of it all.

lines.text: I've been pondering... hopelessness.
lines.voiceText: I've been pondering... hopelessness.

lines.text: You know what haunts me? Everything.
lines.voiceText: You know what haunts me? Everything.

lines.text: You know, I've been thinking... someone's got to pay for this!
lines.voiceText: You know, I've been thinking... someone's got to pay for this!

lines.text: Something's been bothering me... the damn cover-ups!
lines.voiceText: Something's been bothering me... the damn cover-ups!

lines.text: I've been pondering... who to blame!
lines.voiceText: I've been pondering... who to blame!

lines.text: You know what pisses me off? Lies!
lines.voiceText: You know what pisses me off? Lies!

lines.text: *sigh* You know, I've been thinking... why can't people just tell the truth?
lines.voiceText: *sigh* You know, I've been thinking... why can't people just tell the truth?

lines.text: Something's been bothering me... all the nonsense.
lines.voiceText: Something's been bothering me... all the nonsense.

lines.text: I've been pondering... impatience.
lines.voiceText: I've been pondering... impatience.

lines.text: You know what annoys me? Everything.
lines.voiceText: You know what annoys me? Everything.

lines.text: You know, I've been thinking... about how everything connects!
lines.voiceText: You know, I've been thinking... about how everything connects!

lines.text: Something's been bothering me... the hidden links!
lines.voiceText: Something's been bothering me... the hidden links!

lines.text: I've been pondering... the grand conspiracy!
lines.voiceText: I've been pondering... the grand conspiracy!

lines.text: You know what fascinates me? The patterns!
lines.voiceText: You know what fascinates me? The patterns!

lines.text: YOU KNOW, I'VE BEEN THINKING... EVERYTHING IS CONNECTED IN WAYS YOU CAN'T IMAGINE!
lines.voiceText: YOU KNOW, I'VE BEEN THINKING... EVERYTHING IS CONNECTED IN WAYS YOU CAN'T IMAGINE!

lines.text: SOMETHING'S BEEN BOTHERING ME... THE HIDDEN CONNECTIONS BURSTING TO GET OUT!
lines.voiceText: SOMETHING'S BEEN BOTHERING ME... THE HIDDEN CONNECTIONS BURSTING TO GET OUT!

lines.text: I'VE BEEN PONDERING... THE GRAND CONSPIRACY THAT LINKS IT ALL!
lines.voiceText: I'VE BEEN PONDERING... THE GRAND CONSPIRACY THAT LINKS IT ALL!

lines.text: YOU KNOW WHAT EXCITES ME? THE PATTERNS THAT REVEAL EVERYTHING!
lines.voiceText: YOU KNOW WHAT EXCITES ME? THE PATTERNS THAT REVEAL EVERYTHING!
